keyboard.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboard.subtitle: Use keyboard to quickly operate Pixuli

usageTips.title: Usage Tips
usageTips.tip1: Shortcuts won't work in input fields, text areas and other editable elements
usageTips.tip2: Press F1 key to open this help interface anytime
usageTips.tip3: Press Esc key to close current modal
usageTips.tip4: Press / key to quickly focus on search box
